SRI.CIBI THOMAS THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 05-01-2018,THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: sts Ble sl ae Faee 2018/KER/S11 Cr1.MC.No. 8735 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S) ' ANNEXURES: ANNEXURE I- THE TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT. ANNEXURE II- THE TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVITS SWORN IN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE III- THE TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVITS SWORN IN BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE IV- THE TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVITS SWORN IN BY THE 4TH RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE V- THE TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVITS SWORN IN BY THE 5TH RESPONDENT. RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES: NIL /TRUE COPY/ P.A.TO JUDGE sts Beir 2018/KER/S11 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. veseeneee CTEM, NO-8735 of 2047 Dated this the 5 day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioners are the accused in CC No.1366/2016 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Kasaragod, which has arisen from Crime No.164/2016 of Badiadka Police Station for the offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 341, 323, 294(b) and 506(i) read with Section 149 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably settled between the petitioners and the de_ facto complainant, who is the 2 respondent herein. Respondents 3 to 5 are the other injured. 3. Respondenis 2 to 5 have filed Annexures-ll to V affidavits respectively, affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between them and the petitioners and presently, they have no complaints against the petitioners. Beir 2018/KER/S11 Crl.M.C.8735/2017 5. No purpose would be served in proceeding with the matter further. Matters being so, all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.1366/2016 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Kasaragod, which has arisen from Crime No.164/2016 of Badiadka Police Station, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.1366/2016 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Kasaragod, which has arisen from Crime No.164/2016 of Badiadka Police Station, are quashed. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/05/01 /! True Copy // PS to Judge
